46 class _OgreRTSSExport ProgramWriterFactory : public RTShaderSystemAlloc
47 {
48 public:
49  ProgramWriterFactory() {}
50  virtual ~ProgramWriterFactory() {}
51

54 
56  virtual ProgramWriter* create(void) = 0;
57 };
58 
59 class _OgreRTSSExport ProgramWriterManager

67
